ee hinaya man sabawak kara gaththa.obe gayana shailiya?gayan – man priya karanne shasthriya githa gayanna.tehani – mata puluwan ashanthi umara wani ayage githa kiyanna.chamara – hama shailiyakma mata ottuyi.wadath kamathima giya?gayan – thaniwennata mage lowe.tehani – ashanthige piyanani.chamara - sadakalika nowu lokeka.wenath riyaliti wadasatahanakata ayadum nokara sirasa supar starma thora gaththe?gayan - eliyata ena aya janapriya nisa.tehani – gayan kiyapu uththarayamayi math denne.chamara – anka eka sirasayi.
